image.caption: Collection of the U.S. House of Representatives
image.name: B001258_001

profileText: A Representative from Kansas; born in St. Louis, St. Louis County, Mo., August 2, 1955; B.S., William Jewell College, Liberty, Mo., 1977; chemist; teacher; unsuccessful candidate for election to One Hundred and Ninth Congress in 2004; elected as a Democrat to the One Hundred Tenth Congress (January 3, 2007-January 3, 2009); unsuccessful candidate for reelection to the One Hundred Eleventh Congress in 2008; unsuccessful candidate for election to the One Hundred Nineteenth Congress in 2024.

asset.name: B001258_001
asset.creditLine: Collection of the U.S. House of Representatives

researchRecord.name: In the Hilda Enoch Collection, 1952-2012, 15.5 linear feet.
